title: Convert RookeryOS build scripts to .rook package specs
description: Convert all packages from the RookeryOS builder scripts (build_in_chroot.sh and build_blfs_chroot.sh) into proper .rook spec files for rebuilding with rookpkg. This covers the full LFS base system and BLFS extended packages.

title: LFS Base System - Core Libraries
description: Convert core library packages: glibc, zlib, bzip2, xz, lz4, zstd, libxcrypt, readline, ncurses, libffi, expat, libcap, libpipeline

title: LFS Base System - Test Suite
description: Convert test suite packages: tcl, expect, dejagnu

title: BLFS - Security & Authentication
description: Convert security packages: linux-pam, shadow-pam, sudo, polkit, cracklib, libpwquality, gnupg, gpgme, libgpg-error, libgcrypt, libassuan, libksba, npth, pinentry, p11-kit, make-ca

title: BLFS - Networking Libraries
description: Convert network library packages: curl, wget, gnutls, nettle, libtasn1, libidn2, libpsl, libunistring, c-ares, libevent, libmnl, libnl, libndp, libpcap, nghttp2

title: BLFS - Network Services
description: Convert network service packages: networkmanager, dhcpcd, avahi, wpa_supplicant, iptables, modemmanager, libmbim, libqmi

title: BLFS - XML & Documentation
description: Convert XML/doc packages: libxml2, libxslt, docbook-xml, docbook-xsl, itstool, xmlto, libxmlb

title: BLFS - GLib & GObject Stack
description: Convert GLib stack packages: glib2, gobject-introspection, vala, dconf, json-glib, libsecret, libnotify, gsettings-desktop-schemas

title: BLFS - Graphics Libraries
description: Convert graphics library packages: libpng, libjpeg-turbo, libtiff, libwebp, libmng, lcms2, jasper, graphite2, freetype, harfbuzz, fontconfig, pixman, cairo, pango, librsvg, gdk-pixbuf

title: BLFS - X11 & Wayland Core
description: Convert display server packages: xorgproto, util-macros, libXau, libXdmcp, xcb-proto, libxcb, xorg-libraries, xorg-apps, xorg-fonts, xorg-server, xwayland, wayland, wayland-protocols, libxkbcommon, libinput, libevdev, mtdev, libwacom

title: BLFS - Mesa & GPU
description: Convert GPU packages: libdrm, mesa, libva, libvdpau, vulkan-headers, vulkan-loader, spirv-headers, spirv-tools, glslang, shaderc, libepoxy, glu

title: BLFS - Audio Stack
description: Convert audio packages: alsa-lib, alsa-plugins, alsa-utils, pulseaudio, pipewire, wireplumber, libsamplerate, libsndfile, libogg, libvorbis, flac, opus, liba52, libmad, sound-theme-freedesktop, libcanberra

title: LFS Base System - Build Tools
description: Convert build toolchain packages: binutils, gcc, m4, bc, flex, bison, make, patch, autoconf, automake, libtool, pkgconf, gettext, texinfo

title: BLFS - Video & Multimedia
description: Convert video packages: ffmpeg, gstreamer, gst-plugins-base, gst-plugins-good, gst-plugins-bad, gst-plugins-ugly, gst-libav, x264, x265, libvpx, libaom, vlc, nasm

title: BLFS - GTK Stack
description: Convert GTK packages: gtk3, gtk4, at-spi2-core, libepoxy, graphene, fribidi, hicolor-icon-theme, adwaita-icon-theme, shared-mime-info, desktop-file-utils

title: BLFS - Qt6 Stack
description: Convert Qt packages: qt6, qtwebengine, double-conversion, pcre2, icu, libmng, sqlite

title: BLFS - KDE Frameworks
description: Convert KDE framework packages: extra-cmake-modules, phonon, phonon-backend-vlc, polkit-qt, plasma-wayland-protocols, breeze-icons, qca, qcoro, pulseaudio-qt, kirigami-addons, kio-extras, plasma-activities, plasma-activities-stats, oxygen-icons

title: BLFS - Hardware & Storage
description: Convert hardware packages: pciutils, upower, udisks, bluez, lvm2, cryptsetup, smartmontools, lm-sensors, hwdata, libgudev, libusb, libatasmart, libbytesize, libnvme, libblockdev, fuse3, keyutils, libaio, popt, json-c, libyaml

title: BLFS - Desktop Integration
description: Convert desktop packages: xdg-desktop-portal, appstream, bubblewrap, libproxy, iso-codes, libical, lmdb, libqrencode, aspell, power-profiles-daemon, accountsservice, sddm, ibus

title: BLFS - Development Tools
description: Convert development packages: cmake, llvm, rust, cargo-c, boost, nodejs, libuv, nspr, nss, cups, lua, duktape, brotli, libdisplay-info, libxcvt, taglib, sassc, libsass, zxing-cpp, opencv, libqalculate

title: BLFS - Python Packages
description: Convert Python packages: pycairo, pygobject, pytest, pluggy, iniconfig, pathspec, trove-classifiers, hatchling, hatch-vcs, setuptools-scm, editables, pygments, pygdbmi, html5lib

title: BLFS - Miscellaneous
description: Convert misc packages: which, socat, 7zip, xdotool, libdaemon, xcursor-themes, xbitmaps, xinit, xkeyboard-config

title: LFS Base System - Math Libraries
description: Convert math library packages: gmp, mpfr, mpc

title: LFS Base System - System Utilities
description: Convert system utility packages: coreutils, util-linux, procps-ng, psmisc, e2fsprogs, kmod, shadow, file, findutils, gawk, grep, sed, tar, gzip, diffutils

title: LFS Base System - Shell & Text
description: Convert shell and text packages: bash, less, groff, man-db, man-pages, nano

title: LFS Base System - Python & Perl
description: Convert interpreter packages: python, perl, XML-Parser, meson, ninja, setuptools, wheel, flit-core, packaging, jinja2, markupsafe

title: LFS Base System - Init & Services
description: Convert init system packages: systemd, dbus, openssl, gperf, elfutils, acl, attr, gdbm, intltool

title: LFS Base System - Boot
description: Convert bootloader packages: grub, iana-etc, kbd
